author: cnbc.com
title: First American Financial Announces First Quarter 2018 Earnings Conference Call
text:
—Earnings release dates for remainder of 2018—
SANTA ANA, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- First American Financial Corporation (NYSE: FAF), a leading global provider of title insurance, settlement services and risk solutions for real estate transactions, today announced that it will host a conference call on Thursday, April 26, 2018, at 11 a.m. EDT.
The call will follow the release of the company’s earnings results for the first quarter of 2018, which is scheduled earlier that day at 6:45 a.m. EDT.
The conference call, which will also be broadcast over the Internet and is open to investors, members of the financial community, the media and other members of the public, can be accessed online at http://www.firstam.com/investor or by dialing toll free 877-407-8293. Callers from outside the United States may dial 201-689-8349.
An audio replay of the conference call will be available through May 10, 2018 by dialing 201-612-7415 and using the conference ID 13678579. An audio archive of the call and a copy of the first-quarter 2018 earnings release, including the financial information contained therein, will also be available on First American’s investor website.
At the present time, the company expects to issue press releases announcing subsequent quarterly earnings results on the following dates:
• Thursday, July 26, 2018 – Second-quarter results
• Thursday, Oct. 25, 2018 – Third-quarter results
The company will host a conference call on these dates at 11 a.m. EDT.
About First American
First American Financial Corporation (NYSE: FAF) is a leading provider of title insurance, settlement services and risk solutions for real estate transactions that traces its heritage back to 1889. First American also provides title plant management services; title and other real property records and images; valuation products and services; home warranty products; property and casualty insurance; and banking, trust and wealth management services. With total revenue of $5.8 billion in 2017, the company offers its products and services directly and through its agents throughout the United States and abroad. In 2018, First American was named to the Fortune 100 Best Companies to Work For ® list for the third consecutive year. More information about the company can be found at www.firstam.com .
